mapper.sql: id as id, uuid as uuid, ext_po_code as extPoCode, ext_po_type as extPoType, ext_code as extCode, customer_code as customerCode, store_code as storeCode, from_location as fromLocation, to_location as toLocation, delivery_time as deliveryTime, wh_code as whCode, po_status as poStatus, po_type as poType, is_iqc as isIqc, qty_planned as qtyPlanned, qty_rcvd as qtyRcvd, ctn_planned as ctnPlanned, ctn_rcvd as ctnRcvd, ext_memo as extMemo, data_source as dataSource, create_time as createTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_inbound_confirm ( uuid , ext_po_code , ext_po_type , ext_code , customer_code , store_code , from_location , to_location , delivery_time , wh_code , po_status , po_type , is_iqc , qty_planned , qty_rcvd , ctn_planned , ctn_rcvd , ext_memo , data_source , create_time ) VALUES ( #{uuid,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{extPoCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{extPoType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{extCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{customerCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{storeCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{fromLocation,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{toLocation,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{deliveryTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{whCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{poStatus,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{poType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isIqc,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , #{qtyPlanned,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{qtyRcvd,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{ctnPlanned,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{ctnRcvd,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{extMemo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{dataSource,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_inbound_confirm SET uuid = #{uuid,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ext_po_code = #{extPoCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ext_po_type = #{extPoType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ext_code = #{extCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , customer_code = #{customerCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , store_code = #{storeCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , from_location = #{fromLocation,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , to_location = #{toLocation,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , wh_code = #{whCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , po_status = #{poStatus,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , po_type = #{poType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , is_iqc = #{isIqc,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} , qty_planned = #{qtyPlanned,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , qty_rcvd = #{qtyRcvd,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , ctn_planned = #{ctnPlanned,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , ctn_rcvd = #{ctnRcvd,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , ext_memo = #{extMemo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , data_source = #{dataSource,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id = #{id}
